content.raw:
The results folders will contain tab files for each instance. These will store everything previously passed to finish through the instance\_params variable. This means that each one will store the best log likelihood \(or the best validation log likelihood if that was selected\), as well as the params file that goes with it. Lastly, it contains the various filenames used to generate the results: the input master and validation files. If we want to get rid of this folder, these could certainly be determined from the other files in the traindir, I just thought this was simpler for loading and reading between run and finish if you were interested in the results of the various instances.

‌

I have updated the docstring for TrainResults to better reflect what this file actually does, since it is just that class written out.

This means that each one will store the best log likelihood (or the best validation log likelihood if that was selected), as well as the params file that goes with it. Lastly, it contains the various filenames used to generate the results: the input master and validation files. If we want to get rid of this folder, these could certainly be determined from the other files in the traindir, I just thought this was simpler for loading and reading between run and finish if you were interested in the results of the various instances.
